instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors defined in this JSON. Override the default shadcn colors.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' and update font families in tailwind config.
4. LAYOUT: Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid' philosophy. Do not use standard 3-column layouts. Make it asymmetrical.
5. DASHBOARD: Build the Admin Dashboard using the 'Control Room' density. Use a sidebar layout.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. INTERACTION: Add hover states to ALL interactive elements. Use the 'glow' effects specified.
8. FORMS: Use shadcn/ui form components but style them with the 'inputs.default' classes defined above.
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
